name: Shooting Ropes
description:
Shooting Ropes! The game about swinging around in a giant ball filled with presents, and trying to deliver them safely under the christmas tree.

Features:

  • 8 playable characters, including Doncon, Sharky and Palp, and Blobby!
  • Spiderman-style rope-swinging action
  • A city to explore
  • Explode into presents at the push of a button!

The game has a campaign mode with a few levels to play through, as well as a sandbox mode for just exploring the city. Some of the characters have special differences, so be sure to try them all out!

The game has some controller support out of menus.
